    void
    putMark(Mark m, Student s)
    Put mark for certain student In the first place, method checks if student can attend final - checks sum of first and second attestation and checks for retakes If student have retake, student will get F for final exam and add +1 to num of retakes of student In the second place, method using else if statements to determing the grade by formula and puts the grade to student's course

  • Method Details

    • putMark

      public void putMark(Mark m, Student s) throws Exception
      Put mark for certain student In the first place, method checks if student can attend final - checks sum of first and second attestation and checks for retakes If student have retake, student will get F for final exam and add +1 to num of retakes of student In the second place, method using else if statements to determing the grade by formula and puts the grade to student's course
      Parameters:
      m - the mark which will be applied to student
      s - the student that will get the mark
      Throws:
      Exception - if sum of first and second attestation exceed 100 , the method will display message that the grades out of range

    • putAttendance

      public void putAttendance(Date d, Student s, Boolean b)
      Put attendance for student
      Parameters:
      d - the date of attendance
      s - the student
      b - if student is absent the parameter is false, if student is on the lesson the method will put student to attendances list
